text:
(February 19, 1912 – October 29, 2007) was a Japanese movie director and screenwriter. His 1965 movie ' has been famously re-dubbed and re-released as "What's Up, Tiger Lily?" by Woody Allen.
Taniguchi died of pneumonia at a hospital in Tokyo on October 29, 2007, at the age of 95. He was married to actress Kaoru Yachigusa at the time of his death.
